You are given a line of words separated by spaces. Each word is made up of lowercase and uppercase letters.  The "volume" of a word is the number of uppercase letters in it. The "volume" of the entire line of words is the largest volume of any single word in the line.

Calculate and print the volume of the given line of words.
You are given a list of words. Each word has a volume equal to the number of capital letters in it. Find the highest volume among all the words.
